title: Hisnul Muslim - Fortress of the Muslim
notes: This is a starter template. You can manually add more duas or chapters as needed.

duas.arabic: الحَمْـدُ لِلّهِ الّذي أَحْـيانا بَعْـدَ ما أَماتَـنا وَإليه النُّـشور
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah Who gives us life after He has caused us to die and to Him is the return
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee ahyaanaa ba'da maa amaatanaa wa-ilayhin-nushoor

duas.arabic: الحمدُ للهِ الّذي كَساني هذا (الثّوب) وَرَزَقَنيه مِنْ غَـيـْرِ حَولٍ مِنّي وَلا قـوّة
duas.translation: Praise is to Allah Who has clothed me with this (garment) and provided it for me, though I was powerless myself and incapable
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee kasaanee haatha (ath-thawb) wa razaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minnee wa laa quwwah

chapters.title: What to say when wearing a new garment

duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ لَكَ الحَمْـدُ أَنْـتَ كَسَـوْتَنيهِ، أَسْـأَلُـكَ مِنْ خَـيْرِهِ وَخَـيْرِ ما صُنِعَ لَـه، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّهِ وَشَـرِّ ما صُنِعَ لَـه
duas.translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma lakal-hamdu anta kasawtaneehi, as-aluka min khayrihi wa khayri maa suni'a lah, wa a'oothu bika min sharrihi wa sharri maa suni'a lah
